import React, { Component } from "react"; import M from "../../node_modules/materialize-css/dist/js/materialize.min.js"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import defaultImg from '../assets/img/flat-dog-default-2.png'; // import AddPet from "./AddPet"; class Client extends Component { componentDidMount() { document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () { var elems = document.querySelectorAll('.collapsible'); var instances = M.Collapsible.init(elems, {}); }); document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() { var elems = document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-trigger'); var instances = M.Dropdown.init(elems, {}); }); } render() { return (
    {this.props.filteredClients.length ? ( this.props.filteredClients.map((client) => (
  • star_border ({client.id}) - {client.lastname}, {client.firstname}
    Drop Me!
    • one
    • two
    • three
    • view_modulefour
    • cloudfive

    Home Phone: {client.homephone}

    Work Phone: {client.workphone}

    {/*
    ({client.id}), {client.lastname}, {client.firstname} more_vert

    Home Phone: {client.homephone}

    Work Phone: {client.workphone}

    Options close this.props.clientPetOnClick(client)} > Pets list list this.props.clientOnClickEdit(client)} > Edit edit this.props.addingPetToAClient(client)} > Add a Pet add_circle_outline this.props.deleteClientHandleClick(client)} > Delete Client remove_circle_outline
    */} {/*
    ({client.id}), {client.lastname}, {client.firstname}

    home phone: {client.homephone}

    workphone: {client.workphone}

    this.props.clientPetOnClick(client)} > Pets list this.props.addingPetToAClient(client)} > Add a Pet this.props.deleteClientHandleClick(client)} > Delete Client this.props.clientOnClickEdit(client)} > Edit
    */}
    • )) ) : (

    No Clients

    )}
); } } export default Client;
